text: Ra janirakha ki timrobicama allahaka paigambara(sandesta) chan. Yadi dherai jaso kuraharuma unale timro kura manne gardachan bhane timi kathina'ima parnechau. Tara allahale timro nimti imanala'i priya bana'idiyo ra tyasala'i timro hrdayama sundarata pradana gareko cha ra inkara, ullanghana ra avajnala'i timro drstima apriya bana'idi'eko cha. Yahi mancheharu sojho margavalaharu han
